SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface ControllerSkeleton

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface ControllerSkeleton extends Remote
The remote interface for the controller of the game. This interface defines the methods that can be called remotely by clients.

  • Method Details

    • getGameList

      ArrayList<LocalGame> getGameList() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the list of active local games.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of LocalGame instances representing the active local games.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • addFirstPlayer

      String addFirstPlayer(String name, GameMode gameMode, int numPlayer, ClientSkeleton cc) throws RemoteException, GameModeException, GameFullException, NumPlayersException, NameAlreadyExistentException, NotBoundException
      Adds the first player to a new game.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player.
      gameMode - the game mode.
      numPlayer - the number of players in the game.
      cc - the client callback object.
      Returns:
      a String representing the unique identifier of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      GameModeException - if the specified game mode is invalid.
      GameFullException - if the game is already full and cannot accept new players.
      NumPlayersException - if the specified number of players is invalid for the game mode.
      NameAlreadyExistentException - if the specified name is already used by another player.
      NotBoundException - if the client callback object is not bound.

    • addPlayer

      String addPlayer(String name, int gameID, ClientSkeleton cc) throws RemoteException, GameFullException, NameAlreadyExistentException, InvalidGameIdException, NotBoundException
      Adds a player to an existing game.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player.
      gameID - the unique identifier of the game.
      cc - the client callback object.
      Returns:
      a String representing the unique identifier of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      GameFullException - if the game is already full and cannot accept new players.
      NameAlreadyExistentException - if the specified name is already used by another player.
      InvalidGameIdException - if the specified game identifier is invalid.
      NotBoundException - if the client callback object is not bound.

    • pickItem

      void pickItem(Coordinates coordinates, String id) throws RemoteException, NotLinearPickException, LimitReachedPickException, NotCatchablePickException, EmptySlotPickException, NotInGameException, WrongTurnException, OutOfBoardPickException, InvalidIdException
      Picks an item from the board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the item on the board.
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      NotLinearPickException - if the item cannot be picked linearly.
      LimitReachedPickException - if the pick limit has been reached.
      NotCatchablePickException - if the item cannot be caught.
      EmptySlotPickException - if the slot is empty and does not contain an item.
      NotInGameException - if the player is not part of the game.
      WrongTurnException - if it's not the player's turn.
      OutOfBoardPickException - if the specified coordinates are outside the board.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.

    • undoPick

      void undoPick(String id) throws RemoteException, NotInGameException, WrongTurnException, InvalidIdException
      Undoes the last pick action of the player.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      NotInGameException - if the player is not part of the game.
      WrongTurnException - if it's not the player's turn.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.

    • putItemList

      void putItemList(int column, String id) throws RemoteException, EmptyHandException, NotInGameException, WrongTurnException, InvalidColumnPutException, InvalidIdException, NotEnoughSpacePutException
      Puts an item in the player's item list.
      Parameters:
      column - the column where the item should be placed.
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      EmptyHandException - if the player's hand is empty and does not contain any items.
      NotInGameException - if the player is not part of the game.
      WrongTurnException - if it's not the player's turn.
      InvalidColumnPutException - if the specified column is invalid for the item placement.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.
      NotEnoughSpacePutException - if there is not enough space to put the item in the specified column.

    • selectInsertOrder

      void selectInsertOrder(ArrayList<Integer> order, String id) throws RemoteException, WrongLengthOrderException, WrongContentOrderException, NotInGameException, WrongTurnException, InvalidIdException
      Selects the order for inserting items into the player's item list.
      Parameters:
      order - the order of the columns for item insertion.
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      WrongLengthOrderException - if the length of the order list is incorrect.
      WrongContentOrderException - if the content of the order list is incorrect.
      NotInGameException - if the player is not part of the game.
      WrongTurnException - if it's not the player's turn.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.

    • addChatMessage

      void addChatMessage(ChatMessage chatMessage, String id) throws RemoteException, InvalidIdException, InvalidNameException, NotInGameException
      Adds a chat message to the game.
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - the chat message to be added.
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.
      InvalidNameException - if the name of the chat message is invalid.
      NotInGameException

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(String id) throws RemoteException, InvalidIdException, GameFinishedException
      Leaves the game.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.
      GameFinishedException

    • reconnect

      String reconnect(String id, ClientSkeleton cc, ReconnectType reconnectType) throws InvalidIdException, RemoteException, GameFinishedException, AlreadyConnectedException, GameLeftException
      Reconnects a player to a game.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the player.
      cc - the client callback object.
      reconnectType - indicates the type of reconnection.
      Returns:
      a String representing the unique identifier of the game.
      Throws:
      InvalidIdException - if the specified player identifier is invalid.
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      GameFinishedException - if the game has already finished.
      AlreadyConnectedException - if the player is already connected to a game.
      GameLeftException - if the player has left the game.

    • ping

      int ping(int n, String id) throws RemoteException, InvalidIdException
      Sends a ping to the server.
      Parameters:
      n - the ping number.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
      InvalidIdException
